ygData.subject: Re: groflah quest update
ygData.msgSnippet: After reading your post myself and a friend tried this. I spoke with Netuk and headed to the Seafarers Roost. The ogre was there with his female pal, along
ygData.messageBody:
After reading your post myself and a friend tried
this.
I spoke with Netuk and headed to the Seafarers Roost.
The ogre was there with his female pal, along with
several other NPCs that pop in and out and there was
even a neat argument between a bard, troll and dark
elf. But no Groflah.
I did see the barbarian once, he walked into the door
behind the bartenders and disappeared.
I left my friend there then i went down to our guild
and continually triggered the quest from 11PM (EQ
time) to 7AM, but Groflah still.
Any idea about what time you spoke to Netuk, or could
it be possible that he spawned because a Paladin
troggered the quest and by coincidence you did as
well?


Anyway, if anyone has any further detail it would be
appreciated. I will keep trying however.

It was mentioned before that the Lady Shea part was
broken. Does her corpse disappear as Groflah's does in
N Freeport? or does she just not drop the note?

Thanks

Bathory D'Allatu
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule
